statements: SELECT * FROM WasteManagementData;
SELECT project_name, weight FROM WasteManagementData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementData WHERE waste_type='Paper';
SELECT project_name, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM WasteManagementData GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, AVG(weight) AS avg_weight FROM WasteManagementData GROUP BY project_name HAVING avg_weight > 50;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementData WHERE project_name = 'Project X' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT project_name, waste_type, weight FROM WasteManagementData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT MIN(weight), MAX(weight), AVG(weight) FROM WasteManagementData WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementData WHERE date > '2022-06-01' AND weight > 100 ORDER BY weight DESC, date ASC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM WasteManagementData GROUP BY project_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_weight > 100;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_date, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' ORDER BY disposal_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_id = 1;
SELECT collection_date, collection_weight FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_weight > 100;
SELECT disposal_location FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_method, disposal_location FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_collections, SUM(collection_weight) AS total_weight FROM waste_collection;
SELECT * FROM waste_bins
SELECT bin_location, capacity FROM waste_bins
SELECT id, bin_location, waste_type FROM waste_bins
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT center_location, accepted_materials FROM recycling_centers
SELECT * FROM waste_bins WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY bin_location ASC;
SELECT waste_type, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM waste_bins GROUP BY waste_type;

SELECT bin_location, collection_date, collection_weight FROM waste_bins INNER JOIN waste_collection ON waste_bins.id = waste_collection.bin_id WHERE collection_weight > 50 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT center_location, accepted_materials FROM recycling_centers WHERE recycling_capacity > 500 ORDER BY center_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection WHERE waste_category = 'Plastic'
SELECT facility_name, location FROM RecyclingFacilities
SELECT id, disposal_method, quantity FROM WasteManagement WHERE quantity > 1000
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM GreenBuildingProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE waste_category = 'Plastic' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM RecyclingFacilities WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM WasteManagement WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill';
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM GreenBuildingProjects ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT collection_date, truck_number, collected_by FROM WasteCollection WHERE waste_category = 'Paper' AND collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection;
SELECT id, location FROM WasteCollection WHERE collection_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT collection_id, waste_type, recycled_amount FROM RecyclingData ORDER BY recycled_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, building_location FROM BuildingProjects WHERE project_owner = 'Company ABC';
SELECT disposal_method, disposal_cost FROM WasteDisposal WHERE collection_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT WasteCollection.id, WasteCollection.location, RecyclingData.waste_type FROM WasteCollection INNER JOIN RecyclingData ON WasteCollection.id = RecyclingData.collection_id;

SELECT WasteCollection.id, WasteCollection.location, WasteDisposal.disposal_method, WasteProcessing.processing_method FROM WasteCollection INNER JOIN WasteDisposal ON WasteCollection.id = WasteDisposal.collection_id INNER JOIN WasteProcessing ON WasteDisposal.id = WasteProcessing.disposal_id;
SELECT BuildingProjects.project_name, BuildingProjects.building_location FROM BuildingProjects WHERE project_owner = 'Company ABC';

SELECT WasteDisposal.disposal_method, WasteProcessing.processing_method, RecyclingData.recycled_amount FROM WasteDisposal INNER JOIN WasteProcessing ON WasteDisposal.id = WasteProcessing.disposal_id INNER JOIN RecyclingData ON WasteDisposal.collection_id = RecyclingData.collection_id;
